patthana1.21:8.1: Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.21:8.2: ajjhattaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.21:8.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.21:8.10: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā.
patthana1.21:8.11: Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā … pe …
patthana1.21:8.13: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. #1
patthana1.21:9.1: Bahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.21:9.2: bahiddhā ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.21:9.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bahiddhā ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā … pe …
patthana1.21:9.10: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā.
patthana1.21:9.11: Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā … pe …
patthana1.21:9.13: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. #1
patthana1.21:11.1: Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana1.21:11.2: ajjhattaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca … pe …
patthana1.21:11.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe …
patthana1.21:12.1: Bahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana1.21:12.2: bahiddhā ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.21:14.1: Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.21:14.2: ajjhattaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.21:15.1: Bahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.21:15.2: bahiddhā ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.21:17.1: Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati anantarapaccayā, samanantarapaccayā, sahajātapaccayā—
patthana1.21:17.2: ajjhattaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.21:17.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.21:17.10: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā.
patthana1.21:17.11: Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā … pe …
patthana1.21:17.13: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ.
patthana1.21:18.1: Bahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati sahajātapaccayā—
patthana1.21:18.2: bahiddhā ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.21:18.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bahiddhā ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.21:18.10: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā.
patthana1.21:18.13: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ.
patthana1.21:20.1: Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā …
patthana1.21:23.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana1.21:28.1: Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.21:28.2: ahetukaṃ ajjhattaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.21:28.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā.
patthana1.21:28.16: Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana1.21:29.1: Bahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.21:29.2: ahetukaṃ bahiddhā ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.21:29.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā.
patthana1.21:29.16: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana1.21:31.1: Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana1.21:32.1: Bahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana1.21:34.1: Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā … pe …
patthana1.21:34.7: arūpe ajjhattaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca … pe …
patthana1.21:34.10: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.21:34.14: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā.
patthana1.21:35.1: Bahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana1.21:35.2: arūpe bahiddhā ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.21:37.1: Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati napacchājātapaccayā, naāsevanapaccayā, nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.21:38.1: Bahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.21:40.1: Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā (paṭisandhi natthi), naāhārapaccayā—
patthana1.21:41.1: Bahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati naāhārapaccayā—
patthana1.21:42.1: Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati naindriyapaccayā—
patthana1.21:43.1: Bahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati naindriyapaccayā—
patthana1.21:45.1: Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā—
patthana1.21:46.1: Bahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā—
patthana1.21:48.1: Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati namaggapaccayā …
patthana1.21:49.1: Bahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.21:52.1: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe dve, naadhipatiyā dve, naanantare dve, nasamanantare dve (saṃkhittaṃ, sabbattha dve), novigate dve.
patthana1.21:55.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe dve … pe … navipāke nasampayutte navippayutte nonatthiyā novigate dve.
patthana1.21:58.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, anantare dve … pe … magge dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana1.21:66.1: Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.21:66.2: ajjhattaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.21:67.1: Bahiddhā dhammaṃ paccayā bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.21:67.2: bahiddhā ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā … pe …
patthana1.21:69.1: Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā (paṭiccavārasadisaṃ), cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ … pe …
patthana1.21:70.1: Bahiddhā dhammaṃ paccayā bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā (paṭiccavārasadisaṃ), cakkhāyatanaṃ … pe …
patthana1.21:72.1: Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā …
patthana1.21:72.7: (mahābhūtānaṃ khandhānañca pacchā pañcāyatanāni ca vatthu ca kātabbā) aññamaññapaccayā …
patthana1.21:75.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe … pe … avigate dve.
patthana1.21:79.1: Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.21:79.2: ahetukaṃ ajjhattaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā … pe …
patthana1.21:79.6: khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṃ paccayā khandhā.
patthana1.21:79.18: Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana1.21:80.1: Bahiddhā dhammaṃ paccayā bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā (pavattipaṭisandhipi mahābhūtāpi kātabbā)—
patthana1.21:80.7: Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana1.21:85.1: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe dve … pe … novigate dve.
patthana1.21:88.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe dve, naadhipatiyā dve … pe … navipāke nasampayutte navippayutte nonatthiyā novigate dve.
patthana1.21:91.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana1.21:99.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:99.2: ajjhattā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:100.1: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:100.2: bahiddhā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:102.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:102.2: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni … pe …
patthana1.21:102.6: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.21:102.14: ajjhatte khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.21:102.17: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotudhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:102.22: Ajjhattā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.21:103.1: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:103.5: ajjhatte khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.21:103.8: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana1.21:103.12: ajjhattaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ bahiddhā kāyaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:103.13: Ajjhattā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.21:104.1: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:104.2: paro dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā … pe …
patthana1.21:104.4: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti …
patthana1.21:104.6: Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:104.7: Ariyā pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe … pe …
patthana1.21:104.12: bahiddhā khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.21:104.15: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana1.21:104.24: bahiddhā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.21:105.1: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:105.3: Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:105.7: bahiddhā khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.21:105.10: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana1.21:105.16: bahiddhā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.21:107.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:107.4: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā, taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā … pe …
patthana1.21:107.6: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā … pe …
patthana1.21:107.8: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā … pe …
patthana1.21:107.14: ajjhatte khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.21:107.16: ajjhattādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.21:108.1: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:108.6: ajjhatte khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #2
patthana1.21:109.1: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:109.4: paro dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā, taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā … pe …
patthana1.21:109.8: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā … pe …
patthana1.21:109.13: Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:109.17: bahiddhā khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.21:109.19: bahiddhādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.21:110.1: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:110.4: Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:110.8: bahiddhā khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti, abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo … pe …
patthana1.21:112.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:112.2: purimā purimā ajjhattā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ ajjhattānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:112.3: Anulomaṃ gotrabhussa, anulomaṃ vodānassa, gotrabhu maggassa, vodānaṃ maggassa, maggo phalassa, phalaṃ phalassa, anulomaṃ phalasamāpattiyā, nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.21:113.1: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:115.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana1.21:115.4: sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:117.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:117.5: ajjhattaṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ … pe …
patthana1.21:117.15: samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.21:117.41: patthanāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.21:118.1: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:118.5: paro ajjhattaṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana1.21:118.10: senāsanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, pāṇaṃ hanati … pe …
patthana1.21:119.1: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:120.1: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:122.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:122.6: vatthuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati … pe …
patthana1.21:122.8: domanassaṃ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa … pe …
patthana1.21:123.1: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:123.7: domanassaṃ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana1.21:123.10: ajjhattaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ bahiddhā kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.21:124.1: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:124.8: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana1.21:125.1: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:125.7: domanassaṃ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana1.21:125.10: bahiddhā phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ ajjhattassa kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.21:126.1: Ajjhatto ca bahiddhā ca dhammā ajjhattassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:126.3: Bahiddhā rūpāyatanañca ajjhattaṃ cakkhāyatanañca ajjhattassa cakkhuviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana1.21:126.5: bahiddhā phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca ajjhattaṃ kāyāyatanañca ajjhattassa kāyaviññāṇassa … pe …
patthana1.21:126.7: bahiddhā rūpāyatanañca ajjhattaṃ vatthu ca … pe …
patthana1.21:126.9: bahiddhā phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca ajjhattaṃ vatthu ca ajjhattānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.21:127.1: Ajjhatto ca bahiddhā ca dhammā bahiddhā dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:127.3: Ajjhattaṃ rūpāyatanañca bahiddhā cakkhāyatanañca bahiddhā cakkhuviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana1.21:127.5: ajjhattaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca bahiddhā kāyāyatanañca bahiddhā kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:127.6: Ajjhattaṃ rūpāyatanañca bahiddhā vatthu ca … pe …
patthana1.21:127.8: ajjhattaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca bahiddhā vatthu ca bahiddhā khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.21:129.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:129.2: pacchājātā ajjhattā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.21:130.1: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:130.2: pacchājātā bahiddhā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.21:132.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:132.2: purimā purimā ajjhattā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ ajjhattānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:133.1: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:135.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:135.4: ajjhattā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:135.6: ajjhattā cetanā vipākānaṃ ajjhattānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.21:136.1: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:136.4: bahiddhā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:136.6: bahiddhā cetanā vipākānaṃ bahiddhā khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.21:138.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … pe ….
patthana1.21:140.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:140.2: ajjhattā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:140.5: ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro ajjhattassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.21:141.1: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:141.2: ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro bahiddhā kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.21:142.1: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo (pavattipaṭisandhi) bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro bahiddhā kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.21:143.1: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:143.2: bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ajjhattassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.21:144.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca ajjhattassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:144.2: ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca ajjhattassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.21:145.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:145.2: ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.21:147.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo, ajjhattikā indriyā (rūpajīvitindriyampi vitthāretabbaṃ) …
patthana1.21:147.2: jhānapaccayena paccayo … maggapaccayena paccayo … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:148.1: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:150.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:150.4: ajjhatto eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.21:150.16: asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ … pe ….
patthana1.21:150.21: vatthuṃ (purejātasadisaṃ), vatthu ajjhattānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:150.23: ajjhattā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:151.1: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:151.6: vatthuṃ aniccato … pe … vipassati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, ajjhattaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ … pe …
patthana1.21:151.11: Ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhārobahiddhā kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.21:152.1: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:153.1: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:153.8: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, bahiddhā rūpāyatanaṃ … pe …
patthana1.21:153.11: Bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāroajjhattassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.21:154.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca ajjhattassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:154.4: bahiddhā rūpāyatanañca ajjhattaṃ cakkhu ca ajjhattassa cakkhuviññāṇassa … pe …
patthana1.21:154.6: bahiddhā phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca ajjhattaṃ kāyāyatanañca ajjhattassa kāyaviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:154.7: Bahiddhā rūpāyatanañca ajjhattaṃ vatthu ca … pe …
patthana1.21:154.9: bahiddhā phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca ajjhattaṃ vatthu ca ajjhattānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:154.11: ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca ajjhattassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.21:155.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.21:155.4: ajjhattaṃ rūpāyatanañca bahiddhā cakkhāyatanañca bahiddhā cakkhuviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana1.21:155.6: ajjhattaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca bahiddhā kāyāyatanañca bahiddhā kāyaviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:155.7: Ajjhattaṃ rūpāyatanañca bahiddhā vatthu ca bahiddhā khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana1.21:155.9: ajjhattaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca bahiddhā vatthu ca bahiddhā khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:155.11: ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.21:157.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:160.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte cha, pacchājāte āsevane kamme vipāke dve, āhāre cha, indriye dve, jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte dve, atthiyā cha, natthiyā dve, vigate dve, avigate cha.
patthana1.21:163.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.21:164.1: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.21:165.1: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.21:166.1: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.21:167.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca ajjhattassa dhammassa purejātaṃ, āhāraṃ. #1
patthana1.21:168.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammassa purejātaṃ, āhāraṃ. #2
patthana1.21:172.1: Nahetuyā cha, naārammaṇe cha, naadhipatiyā cha (saṃkhittaṃ, sabbattha cha kātabbā), navippayutte cha, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā cha, novigate cha, noavigate cattāri (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ)
patthana1.21:176.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe dve, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye dve (saṃkhittaṃ, sabbattha dve), nasampayutte navippayutte nonatthiyā novigate dve.
patthana1.21:179.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri (anulomapadāni gaṇetabbāni), avigate cha.
